title: Oğlan Bizim Kız Bizim
overview: Zeynep, a white-collar worker who has just broken up with her boyfriend of five years, goes on a vacation she won on the radio with her closest female friend, while Barış, a car mechanic who doesn't believe in love, takes his best friend Emrah on the same vacation. From the moment they meet, the young people, who hate each other, spend most of their vacation trying to ruin it for one another. During their constant bickering, Barış and Zeynep grow closer and fall in love, but before they can fully embrace their feelings, Zeynep's ex-boyfriend suddenly shows up, complicating matters.
